task.summary: Continued work on accounts...cookies now work and login/logout functionality is complete.
Add in popup functionality and server callback hooks that enable them to work with remote/iframe content
User functionality. Complete profile page, take care of authenticating new email addresses and auto-notifications for email/password changes.
Complete external hash login script, more JS cleanup to remove old code.
Affiliate stuff looks more or less done for now...missing ability for user to join an affiliate network. Users list still poorly displayed.
Accountbar is now active and working.
network chooser is now working and attached to new/edit user as well
Moderation counts for user-affiliate now works, groundwork laid for mixins to work for all element types.
Add email subscriptions and default subscriptions for users
Begin entity work, with jobs as first entity. Current 'new' works. Next up is 'edit' and all moderation functionality 'approve/reject'. methods in controller mixin should serve as guide
attempt to fix delayed job issue
Finish mixin entity stuff, should be working. More testing needed to be sure.
Add primary network to user profile
Base EF and developer layouts created
Event datetime work with working timezone shifting
add onhashchange controls for item detail (or any direct ajax remote request)
Finish front-end views and search/filter bars
Comment engine completion. Still need to add to discussion detail page, add comments column to discussion, test in general
Finish comments to allow reply to comment via email, also allow emails to discussions@reply.energyfolks.com to post discussion posts. Needs to be tested on SERVER.
fix irreversible migration to allow rollbacks
